replies.msg: Last Tuesday, i complained that i was treated badly at the restaurant. As s result, a waiter provided a referral to a senior staff member who in turn referred my case to the branch manager. I'll follow up with the branch manager on the case to be sure that it'll be dealt with seriously. By the way, my friend Celine stuffers a stroke so i referred her to a cardiologist. Recently, she posted on an online forum and suggested that the government should build an art gallery so as to promote tourism which was supported by many people on the forum. They asked the forum administrator for a referral to a district councilor. They'll follow up with the district councilor on the matter being discussed. I too will follow up on the issue. Her suggestions for the city's future and the citizens are deemed appropriate. Last Sunday, Celine and I went to an art museum where we looked at every single huge nineteenth-century oil painting in the museum in minute detail lest we miss any wonderful things. She'll be giving a birthday party in Rosewood Hotel rather than at her home in order not to bother her neighbouring homeowners.
